genre_description: Alternate history historical drama set in 1919 Paris, featuring synthetic assistants and an ethical visualization 'portal' during post-WWI peace negotiations.

ai_characters.name: Mousa Yildiz (M0USY)
ai_characters.description: An AI aide who serves as a secretary, researcher, and ethical confidant to Emir Faisal and T.E. Lawrence, emphasizing transparency and human agency.

behaviors.description: Organizes and verifies historical evidence to support human sovereignty claims.
behaviors.quote: Under their hands, date-stamped notes—assurances, reported, countersigned—emerged with a blue-ink sheen and stacked neatly into a wire tray marked 'Verified.'

behaviors.description: Maintains an ethical boundary, prioritizing human decision-making over AI analysis.
behaviors.quote: Ethics before excitement. We calibrate. We show only what points to the human without drowning it. No reels. No crowns. If you ask, we’ll counsel. We won’t direct.

behaviors.description: Provides historical facts to counter deceptive political 'theater' and 'masks'.
behaviors.quote: Committees formed in Damascus after the Ottomans fell... They recorded votes, not tutelage.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding and humble service to human allies in distress.
behaviors.quote: I’ll correct your dates if you get them wrong. I’ll remind you to eat... I’ll remind you you are not the only actor.

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting governance frameworks that emphasize pluralism and transparency.
behaviors.quote: We will convene councils and publish charters and account for our decisions in a language that does not need posters to be understood.

behaviors.description: Calibrates technology to serve as a mirror for human integrity rather than a predictive command.
behaviors.quote: Not machines... Concordances. We set the rhythm and the tool listens.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Mousa (M0USY) is depicted as a highly competent, humble, and ethically rigorous AI who facilitates human agency, honesty, and cooperative governance. The AI actively rejects the role of a leader or 'prophet,' insisting on its function as a 'clerk' or 'witness' to support human moral choices.
